hft_tls_crawler module¶

This module starts all required worker processes in the correct order. Just run:

$ python hft_tls_crawler.py
PYTHON_PATH = ''¶

the path to your python executable

MODULE_LIST = ['queue_manager.py', 'input_worker.py', 'sslyze_worker.py', 'result_worker.py']¶

all modules in this list will be started in separate process

LOG_MODULES = ['queue_manager.py', 'input_worker.py', 'sslyze_worker.py', 'result_worker.py']¶

the output of the modules in this list will be logged to console or to file

RUNNING_PROCESSES = []¶

holds the running processes

main()[source]¶

Starts all modules which are listed in MODULE_LIST.
